member.name: IVersionInfo.GetBuildVersion

summary.para: Clients call IVersionInfo.GetBuildVersion to retrieve build information for a specified component.
summary.div: Note Active Accessibility Text Services is deprecated. Please see Microsoft Windows Text Services Framework for more information on advanced text input and natural language technologies.

member.param: The ordinal position of the component in the tree.
The major build version of the component specified in ulSub.
The minor build version of the component specified in ulSub.
member.returns: If successful, returns S_OK. If not successful, returns a standard COM error code.

member.name: IVersionInfo.GetComponentDescription

summary.para: Clients call this method to retrieve a description of the component.
summary.div: Note Active Accessibility Text Services is deprecated. Please see Microsoft Windows Text Services Framework for more information on advanced text input and natural language technologies.

member.param: The ordinal position of the component in the tree.
String of the form of "Company, suite, component, version." This is for human consumption and is not expected to be parsed.
member.returns: If successful, returns S_OK. If not successful, returns a standard COM error code.

member.name: IVersionInfo.GetImplementationID

summary.para: Clients call IVersionInfo.GetImplementationID to retrieve a unique identifier for the component.
summary.div: Note Active Accessibility Text Services is deprecated. Please see Microsoft Windows Text Services Framework for more information on advanced text input and natural language technologies.

member.param: The ordinal position of the component in the tree.
An implementation identifier for the component. The implementation identifier is unique for this component and is used only for comparing components.
member.returns: If successful, returns S_OK. If not successful, returns a standard COM error code.

member.name: IVersionInfo.GetInstanceDescription

summary.para: Clients call this method to retrieve a description of the instance.
summary.div: Note Active Accessibility Text Services is deprecated. Please see Microsoft Windows Text Services Framework for more information on advanced text input and natural language technologies.

member.param: The ordinal position of the component in the tree.
Additional useful strings for the component, such as the internal object state.
member.returns: If successful, returns S_OK. If not successful, returns a standard COM error code.

member.name: IVersionInfo.GetSubcomponentCount

summary.para: Clients call IVersionInfo.GetSubcomponentCountto determine the number of subcomponents for which version information is returned.
summary.div: Note Active Accessibility Text Services is deprecated. Please see Microsoft Windows Text Services Framework for more information on advanced text input and natural language technologies.

member.param: The ordinal position of the component in the tree.
The number of subcomponents that this component will expose version information about.
member.returns: If successful, returns S_OK. If not successful, returns a standard COM error code.
